snippet.title: Quake - Meat Jam
snippet.description:
Download: https://www.slipseer.com/index.php?resources/meat-jam.392/

A community map jam for Quake 1, where participants had a month to create a level focusing on meat. This pack contains 12 maps, including the start map. Runs on the Quoth mod, which is included, and adds new enemies, weapons, and powerups.

To play this, put the "meatjam" folder in your Quake directory, launch the game, open the console with "~", type "game meatjam", and then just start a new game to load the start map. I recommend playing this on the vkQuake or Ironwail source ports.
vkQuake github: https://github.com/Novum/vkQuake/releases/tag/1.31.1.1
Ironwail dev build: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kcWmMFD8t2NINm2TlaRJbh2GZqx55iHF/view?usp=drive_link
Ironwail github: https://github.com/andrei-drexler/ironwail/releases/tag/v0.7.0

To currently play the Carrion Star map, you need to either use the latest vkQuake, a dev build of Ironwail, or add a heapsize argument to your shortcut. To do that, right click your .exe file (like ironwail.exe or quake.exe), click create shortcut, right click the shortcut you just made, click properties, and at the end of the target field, add -heapsize 6048000

The trailer music is "A Place To Call Home" by Atrium Carceri: https://cryochamber.bandcamp.com/album/ptahil

► Website: https://www.amelieclanglois.com/level-design
► Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/comfybythefire
► The Comfiest Discord: https://discord.gg/TQErzNeSsp
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/amelieclanglois
► Shorts Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/ComfyByTheFire
► TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@comfybythefire
► Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AmelieCLanglois
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/amelieclanglois/
► Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/AmelieCLanglois

#quake #quake1 #quakeremastered
